name: Love challenge
description:
Love challenge is an adult-oriented visual novel game, the features include:
- With more than 50,000 words of plot content, through dialogue, choose and guide three women with different personalities, and start a journey of super friendship with them.
- Dynamic drama performance.
- Freely arranged gallery mode, choose the character, location, and pose you want to have sex.
- Rich custom body options, free to adjust the size of chest, abdomen, legs, buttocks, ears.
- Rich clothing, accessories, and hairstyles to create a woman that suits your preferences! !
- Rotate the camera freely to watch their beauty from various angles! !
- In the exquisite snow mountain villa, experience different postures on each piece of furniture.




◇ Story

You are a retired male whore with a villa on the hill. On this day, three beauties came out of nowhere to seek help. Taking advantage of the opportunity of the three beauties spending the night, use your expertise to make them willing to sleep with you without the other two beauties knowing.


◆ Miya


- A high school female teacher with a pure appearance but a sullen personality.
- D-cup body, white shirt stretched to the point where the buttons pop out.
- Cute innocent eyes and nice short hair.


◆ Dora


- The scheming wealthy family exudes a coquettish temperament.
- A third-line actor, with iconic body and facial features, but has never become popular in the entertainment circle.
- She has a strong personality and likes to show off her famous brand.


◆ Amy


- Secretary to the President of a multinational financial institution.
- She has to accompany the president to socialize, and is often sexually harassed by her boss and clients.
- Desire to marry into a wealthy family and get rid of this life of dependence on others.
